subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to write effective tests?
msgSnippet: ... Indeed, I did.  And I thought it was very cool that you invited some developers of JUnit extensions and such to contribute to the book.  But I d still be
messageBody:
Dave Astels wrote:

>--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Mike Clark <mike@c...> wrote:
>
>
>
>>I had the pleasure of being a reviewer of Dave's upcoming book.
>>
>>
>
>You forgot to mention that you wrote the section on JUnitPerf.
>

Indeed, I did. And I thought it was very cool that you invited some
developers of JUnit extensions and such to contribute to the book. But
I'd still be gushing about the book if I wasn't a contributor. It all
pays the same. :-)

Mike

--
Mike Clark
http://clarkware.com
